item.description:
This is only a random date/time in order to post this.

There is a Limelight Deal today for Little Harbor in Wareham. $25 for $50 of cart and greens fees.

I think we have some golfers and LH is a cute, par 3 course, so a lot of fun.

 

The link for the deal:

 

http://www.limelightdeals.com/deal/southcoast/harbor-country-club?utm_source=i&utm_campaign=da3&utm_medium=email&blastID=506041&rcpEmail=vlisinski%40hotmail.com

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Golf at Little Harbor
